text_block_list.text: Ahaha, hahahahaha! I got second! I really got second! That was freakin' awesome! Goddesses, I feel amazing…
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: "It's just… I want to make you strong, too!"
"It's just… I want to make you strong, too!"
…So that asshole did manage to get some results, huh. What's their deal?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: (No sighs or fake smiles. Didn't get fed up or quit on me or nothin'. They just saw me… really saw me. Told me I could get stronger with those eyes. And they were serious.)
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Trainer! What're we doing today? 
What, we warmin' up again or something, that it?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: You want me to slow down my pace while I run? Or do some muscle training first? What's it gonna be, huh?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: …Alright! That was pretty good, wasn't it! What's next?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Today, Espoir City is surprisingly eager to train. Maybe the results from that mock race stirred something inside her?
So we're running on dirt this time, huh? Feels like I've got some extra power here, too… time to go all out!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: As I watch her flying across the dirt at full power, I feel my jaw drop open. Her dirt running…
choice_data_list: Is so much better her turf running!

text_block_list.text: Being able to run across coarse dirt without getting tripped up is a talent in itself. In particular, the snap of her right foot lets her accelerate faster than she ever did on turf.
choice_data_list: (I want to enter her in a dirt race so bad!)

text_block_list.text: There are plenty of Umamusume who do training on dirt, but being able to actually race on dirt is a different feat. But I'm sure Espoir City could do it!
A dirt race…? Y'said, dirt…?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: SHUT THE HELL UP!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: She was in such a good mood just a minute ago, but now I've incurred her wrath again. I have no idea what it could be, but I feel like…
I absolutely hate dirt, y'hear me?! Can't freakin' stand it!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Your father is amazing, you know! All the Umamusume who trained on dirt under him became really strong and won tons of dirt races! Do you want to give it a try, Espo?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City's Mom

text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'm gonna go to Dad's club! I'm gonna get so strong on dirt, too!
text_block_list.name: Young Espoir City
Espoir City's Dad
text_block_list.text: Stop there. This is too much for you, Espo. Running around with opponents you can't beat… you tryin' to kill yourself or something?
Hmph. You're just a big fat coward! 'Cause… 'cause I'm gonna be strong! Stronger than anyone you ever trained!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: You need to learn to quit while you're behind! You and yer thick head… quit pushing yerself so damn hard when you're so weak.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City's Dad

text_block_list.text: (I hated it. I hated it so damn much! Tellin' me I was weak over and over with that sigh! That's why I quit! Told him to shove it and quit!)
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: (Racing ain't just about dirt! So I always told myself, who gives a damn about dirt?! …But. But, but…!)
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Ugh, fine!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: But you gotta tell me. Why do you wanna race on dirt so bad?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Espoir City quashes her anger and asks me one simple question. Choosing my words carefully, I answer directly.
choice_data_list: Your running style is perfect for it.
Your running style is perfect for it.

text_block_list.text: It is, huh?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Then put me in already! 
You better believe in me. 'Cause I'm gonna win!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: (Time to see if you're gonna keep on looking at me with those eyes! You better prove to me that you're different from all the rest.)
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: After two weeks at Kokura, the day of the final mock race is upon us before we know it.
Exhaling quietly, Espoir City heads for the track. And then…
(KA-CHUNK!)
(The lead! I gotta seize the front! All the way in front! And I have to be strong… stronger than anyone!)
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: (I'll be a strong Umamusume who Mom can rely on. Strong enough to make everyone who looked down on me eat their words.)
text_block_list.name: Espoir City
Dad & Instructor's Voices
text_block_list.text: Quit pushin' yerself. You're just weak. If you don't do this, then you can't win, you know. You need to understand yourself better. Your power's lacking, so…
…You're wrong.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: You're wrong, you're wrong, you're all wrong! I ain't gonna listen! No way in hell! 'Cause I'm…
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: I'm strong! I'm a strong Umamusume! …I wanna win. I wanna win, I wanna win, I wanna win!!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: GRAAAAAAAAH!!!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Espoir City takes home the gold. With a time of 1.1 seconds between her and the next runner, it's an overwhelming victory.
Hah, whaddya think? Got yer socks blown off?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Yeah… Yeah! 
Seems like y'finally got the message, ya blockhead!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: I can do this! Even if I got a rookie trainer like you with me, I'll keep on winnin' in the Twinkle Series, too!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: That means… I guess I'm fine with you lookin' after me or whatever, dammit.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Are you even listenin'?! I toldja, you can be my trainer or whatever if you want, okay?! 'N you can call me Espo too, I guess.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: I clutch the notebook I've been using for her training with both hands, eagerly awaiting the moments from here on out where I'm sure to see her bloom again.
Hah, what's that thing? Some kinda textbook? For who?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: You serious?! Man, you really are some kinda rookie. Seriously.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: "If you trust her and set the stage for her success, she will live up to those expectations." With that, I've filled up another page of my notebook.
